name: Wireless Headphones
description: Experience crystal-clear audio with our wireless headphones, featuring premium sound quality, long-lasting battery life, and a comfortable over-ear design for all-day use. Perfect for music, movies, or video calls.

name: Smart Watch
description: This sleek smart watch helps you stay connected on the go, offering real-time notifications, step and heart rate tracking, sleep monitoring, and water resistance. A perfect fitness and productivity companion.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy powerful bass and clear treble with this portable Bluetooth speaker. With a compact design, built-in mic, and 10-hour battery life, it’s perfect for indoor and outdoor gatherings alike.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Designed for competitive gamers, this ergonomic gaming mouse features adjustable DPI settings, programmable buttons, and RGB lighting for ultimate control and style in every match.

name: LED Monitor
description: Upgrade your workstation or gaming setup with this 24-inch Full HD LED monitor. With ultra-thin bezels, HDMI and VGA ports, and crisp display quality, it delivers immersive viewing from every angle.

name: Laptop Stand
description: This sturdy and lightweight laptop stand improves posture and airflow while working. Adjustable height and anti-slip pads make it ideal for desks, home offices, or remote work setups.

name: Wireless Keyboard
description: A slim and quiet wireless keyboard with low-profile keys and ergonomic design. Connect seamlessly via Bluetooth or USB receiver and type comfortably for hours on end.

name: Smartphone Tripod
description: Capture stable videos and selfies with this flexible smartphone tripod. Features adjustable legs, universal phone mount, and a compact design that fits easily in any travel bag.

name: Portable SSD
description: Transfer files quickly with this 500GB portable SSD, offering blazing-fast read/write speeds, shock resistance, and compatibility with all major OS. Ideal for photographers, developers, and travelers.

name: Webcam 1080p
description: Enhance your virtual meetings with this 1080p HD webcam. With auto light adjustment, a noise-reducing mic, and plug-and-play support, it's perfect for work-from-home and streaming.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Charge your devices effortlessly with this sleek wireless charger pad. Supports fast charging for all Qi-enabled phones and features smart temperature control for safe operation.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Expand your laptop’s connectivity with this multi-port USB-C hub. Includes HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and more — all packed into a slim, travel-friendly design.

name: Noise-Canceling Earbuds
description: These wireless earbuds offer premium sound with active noise cancellation, touch controls, and a charging case that delivers up to 24 hours of battery life.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Monitor your fitness journey with this sleek tracker. Track steps, calories, sleep patterns, and heart rate while syncing data to your smartphone via Bluetooth.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: A full-sized mechanical keyboard with clicky blue switches, RGB backlighting, and durable keycaps — perfect for gaming, programming, or productivity.

name: Tablet Stand
description: Use your tablet hands-free with this adjustable stand. Compatible with all major tablets, it features anti-slip grips and foldable arms for easy portability.

name: Smart Light Bulb
description: Transform any room with this smart LED bulb. Control brightness and color from your phone or voice assistant. Energy-efficient and easy to set up via Wi-Fi.

name: Laptop Sleeve
description: Protect your laptop with this padded, water-resistant sleeve. Features a smooth zipper and extra pocket for accessories — fits 13" to 15.6" devices.

name: Action Camera
description: Capture your adventures in stunning 4K with this waterproof action camera. Includes multiple mounts, a touchscreen, and slow-motion recording mode.

name: Desk Organizer
description: Keep your workspace tidy with this multi-compartment desk organizer. Store pens, notepads, cables, and more in a compact, minimalistic design.
